name: Exoplanet: First Contact
description: Welcome to the harsh and unforgiving world of a space western! Explore a wild and dangerous planet, become a mercenary for a soulless corporation or ally yourself with oppressed free colonists. Join the new Gold Rush and fight for your life.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.5 GHz Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon R9 270X DirectX: Version 10 Sound Card: DirectX9 Compatible Additional Notes: IMPORTANT: INTEL INTEGRATED GRAPHICS ARE NOT SUPPORTED
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0 GHz Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 / AMD Radeon R9 280X DirectX: Version 10 Sound Card: DirectX9 Compatible Additional Notes: IMPORTANT: INTEL INTEGRATED GRAPHICS ARE NOT SUPPORTED
